<template>

  


</template>

<script>
import apiClient from '@/services/ApiService';

export default {
  data() {
    return {
      isAuth: true,
      posts: [],
    }
  },
  methods: {
    async getAllPosts() {
      try {
        const token = localStorage.getItem('authToken');
        if (!token) {
          this.isAuth = false
          return
        }
        const response = await apiClient.get(`/posts`, {
          headers: {
            Authorization: `Bearer ${token}`
          }
        });
        this.posts = response.data;
      } catch (error) {
        console.error('Error getting posts:', error);
      }
    },
  },
  mounted() {
    this.getAllPosts();
  }
};
</script>

<style scoped>
.home {
  min-height: calc(100vh - 56px);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  background-color: rgba(248, 249, 250, 0.9);
  padding: 20px;
  border-radius: 15px;
  box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}

.home h1 {
  color: #343a40;
  font-weight: 300;
  text-align: center;
}

.home i {
  color: #1abc9c;
}

.posts-container {
  margin-top: 20px;
}

.post-card {
  display: flex;
  padding: 15px;
  border-radius: 10px;
  background-color: #fff;
  transition: box-shadow 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
  border: 1px solid #ddd;
  align-items: center;
}

.post-card:hover {
  box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
  transform: translateY(-5px);
}

.post-image {
  width: 200px;
  height: 200px;
  object-fit: contain;
  object-position: center;
  display: block;
  margin: auto 0;
}

.post-content {
  flex: 1;
  margin-left: 15px;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
}

.post-title {
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  margin: 0.5rem 0;
  color: #333;
}

@media (max-width: 576px) {
  .home h1 {
    font-size: 1.5rem;
  }

  .home i {
    font-size: 3rem;
  }
}
</style>
